Uses of ForwardPanel in forward
 

Subclasses of ForwardPanel in forward
 class ForwardPanelMenu
          copyright (c) 2010-2011 e-Amrita - Giampietro Zedda Turin (Italy) ForwardPanelMenu This class implements all forward menu panels in a general way as listed in EnumForwardMenuOptions
As any custom implementation, as this one is just a project rule, forward lets you to tailor, if it needs, all parameters
directly on the java object used.

Methods in forward that return types with arguments of type ForwardPanel
 java.util.List<ForwardPanel> ForwardFunction.getPanels()
          Return a list with all panels declared for the function.
 java.util.List<ForwardPanel> ForwardFunction.getPanelsDetail()
          Return a list with only detail panels declared for the function, as coded by forward.
